tool.name: Get document
tool.help:
**What it does**
Retrieves a single document from the `Manually Annotated Sub-Corpus <http://www.anc.org/data/masc/>`_ (MASC 3.0.0).
.. class:: infomark
**TIPS**
* Use the *Get Data->MASC: List all document IDs* tool to obtain a list of valid document ID values. * Use *Convert Formats->Wrap data as LIF object* to input MASC documents to tools requiring LIF.
